price: 29. Isin faxxaanam matakka Yallay ginô Rabbih yani faxah akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
